Content: I love the layout, it looks great and it's easy to read. But, unfortunately, this app has gotten more inaccurate every year to the point that I have to switch now. Also, being an early premium buyer doesn't mean anything now bc they are pushing for a subscription... To weather... Switched to a much more accurate app, but it looks terrible in comparison... But, I need accuracy for my job, and this isn't accurate anymore. Not even close.
App Name: AccuWeather: Weather Alerts & Live Storm Radar
Strongest Sub-Dimension Definition: The app is ease to use, accessible, and respond quickly when the users interacts with it.
